name: Tan Tan
info: Served in Japanese style sesame chili soup with house-made ground spicy soy meat and bok choy.

name: Nikutama
info: Made-to-order noodles served with sweet and savory beef, hot spring egg, and BK sauce. Can be served cold upon request.

name: Tonkutsu
info: Made-to-order noodles served in a pork broth with chashu pork, miso ground pork, garlic, and seasoned egg.
